results.title: The Christmas dream
results.creator_credit: Czechoslovak Film Corporation, B Zeman and K Zeman
results.brief_description: A fantasy in which a little girl’s toys come to life in a dream - the toys being played by puppets. (The film is noteworthy for the excellence of the puppet animation in the original material - for American distribution introductory and concluding sequences have been added to the film by Castle Films, USA.). Music only - no language.

results.title: The Christmas burglars
results.creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
results.brief_description: Christmas morning brings an unexpected pleasant surprise for a desperate mother and her young daughter. Cast includes Florence Lawrence, Adele DeGarde, Charles Inslee, George Gebhardt, Mack Sennett, Harry Solter. Silent film with English intertitles.

results.title: The Chosen people
results.creator_credit: Peter Montagnon, Brian Lewis and BBC
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “The Long Search”.
In this video Ronald Eyre explores the concept of “the chosen people” and the significance of the holocaust with Eli Wiesel, the leader of the Amadeus Quartet, a Jerusalem rabbi and a New York lawyer. He also discovers the Jewish love of words and argument, which stems from their need to constantly reinterpret the word of God, and their propensity to illustrate their arguments with humorous stories and jokes.

results.title: The Chosen
results.creator_credit: Chosen Film Company, Edie Landau, Ely Landau and Jeremy Kagan
results.brief_description: Based on the novel by Chaim Potok which explores the friendship that develops between two adolescent Jewish boys living in New York in the 1940s. The boys are from vastly different Jewish backgrounds, one being an Hasidic Jew and the other a Zionist. Features Rod Steiger, Maximilian Schell as the boys fathers together with Robby Benson and Barry Miller.

results.title: The Chordates Diversity in Structure
results.brief_description: Basic characteristics that relate all chordates, from tiny tunicates to world-ruling primates, are explained. Also describes the diversity and adaptations of vertebrates, the most advanced chordates, with special reference to the relationship between structure and potential for survival

results.title: The Chord sharp = Der Falschspieler = Le Faux joueur
results.creator_credit: Hand Made Films, Volker Kriegel, Ian Moo Young, Joachim Kreck and Alastair McIlwain
results.brief_description: A superbly animated non-narrated look at the making of a rock superstar. Details, in images that can be easily read by children, the way in which the hype process both creates a media personality and effectively dehumanizes that personality at the same time. Suitable for middle and upper primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: The Choice is yours (Industrial safety)
results.creator_credit: Erika Hellfritsch, Colin Fox, John Ward, Ken Daley and Drayton Film Productions
results.brief_description: Considers the problems of industrial safety on civil engineering construction sites. Makes the point that it is not the obviously risky jobs and locations that cause the majority of accidents but simple carelessness. Reconstructs accidents, and stresses the value of goggles.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Erika Hellfritsch, Colin Fox, John Ward, Ken Daley and Drayton Film Productions

results.title: The Choice is yours
results.creator_credit: National Woman's Christian Temperance Union and Fred S Niemann
results.brief_description: Features Dr Andrew C. Ivy, Head of the University of Illinois Professional Schools in Chicago, and a young boy and girl questioning a chemistry teacher about alcohol. Through animation, the film shows physical effects of alcohol.
